name: Slovak birth certificate number
description: Slovak notation of a birth certificate number with consistent date delimiters.Valid delimiters for date parts are "dot" or "space", which may be surrounded with whitespaces. Both delimiters have to be same.Valid delimiter of the subnumber has to be "slash", which may be surrounded with whitespaces.Subnumber may be 3 or 4 digit number.
author: Libor Gabaj
